div.class: container-fluid logo-menu absolute absolute-left absolute-right z3

div.h2: Schools will remain closed through the end of this school year
div.p: The safety of our students and staff is our highest priority. We have been monitoring the situation and are aware that Coronavirus (COVID-19) cases have been confirmed in South Dakota. Schools will remain closed through the end of this school year.

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; margin-top: 5px;
img.title: Our Vision and Mission: To educate and prepare each student to succeed in a changing world.

a.title: Print article < Meals and School Material Distribution >
Email this link to a friend

div.p: Grab-and-go sack lunches will be available to pick-up by a healthy member of your family from 11:30 am - 12:30 pm Monday through Friday.

Sites for lunches will include:
Laura B. Anderson Elementary: 1600 N Wayland Place
Hawthorne Elementary: 601 N Spring Avenue
Hayward Elementary: 400 N Valley View Road
Anne Sullivan Elementary: 3701 E 3rd Street
Terry Redlin Elementary: 1721 E Austin Street
Lowell Elementary: 710 W 18th Street

In addition to the six school locations for FREE grab-and-go meals, school buses will stop in high-need neighborhoods to make sure students had access to meals and school materials today. School staff ride these buses and reported many smiling faces as deliveries are made. We Truly miss our Students!!

a.button: Meal and School Material Distribution Bus Stops

a.title: Email this link to a friend

div.p:
If you do NOT have a child already in school:
Use the Online Student Registration

Do you have an older child already in school?
Use your Parent Portal account
